original_text: Every Sabbath day, the ruler will bring six lambs and a male sheep as a burnt offering to the Lord. These animals must have nothing wrong with them.
korean_text: 안식일에 군주가 여호와께 드릴 번제는 흠 없는 어린 양 여섯 마리와 흠 없는 숫양 한 마리라

sentences.original_text: the ruler will bring six lambs
sentences.korean_translation: 통치자는 어린 양 여섯 마리를 가져올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: as a burnt offering to the Lord
These animals must have nothing wrong with them
sentences.korean_translation: 이 동물들은 아무런 흠이 없어야 합니다
